text: new paragraph mechanical licensing certified service plumber amend rsa by inserting after paragraph i the following new paragraph certified service plumber means any person who as a plumbing apprentice has completed at least hours of direct supervision by a certified service plumber or journeyman plumber of incidental repair installation and maintenance of plumbing as defined in rules adopted by the board new subparagraph mechanical licensing board rulemaking amend rsa i a by inserting after subparagraph the following new subparagraph certified service plumber
